name: Jenny's Morning Social Media Report (Lawrance & Rangoni)

payload.message:
Run the social media morning report script for Jenny: /home/rm/.openclaw/workspace/social_morning_report_jenny.sh

This script fetches latest posts from Lawrance Furniture (Facebook, Instagram) and Rangoni Firenze (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube) and sends a summary report to Jenny via Discord DM (user_id: 1372233289590505524).

Once Firecrawl or ScrapeGraphAI MCP is configured with API keys, upgrade the script to fetch real post content instead of placeholder summaries.
